description:
Located in one of Berwick's blue chip pockets, find yourself within walking distance to Berwick Village shopping strip, Wilson Botanic Park, elite schools, Pioneers Park, Reserves and public transport.

With plan & permits Ready for Four Townhouses all with their own private backyards and lock-up garages, this is the opportunity to make your mark in the Casey municipality's most prestigious suburb!

- Townhouse 1: 4 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, 1 Powder room, 1 car garage, private backyard
- Townhouse 2: 4 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, 1 powder room, 2 car garage, private backyard
- Townhouse 3: 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, 2 car garage, private backyard
- Townhouse 4: 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, 2 car garage, private backyard

Amenities in Walking-Distance:

> Berwick Train Station 900m / 3min Drive
> Berwick High Street (Main Strip) 900m
> Wilsons Botanic Park 800m
> Federation University 900m
> Monash Health Casey Hospital 4min Drive
> Monash Freeway Entrances (M1) 3min Drive
> Eden Rise Shopping Centre 6 min Drive
> Fountain Gate Shopping Centre 8min Drive

With luxury townhouses in Berwick achieving 7-figure prices, this could be the project to put you on the map as a premium developer. Opposite the house is the Wilson Botanic Park and a very short walk to High Street shops, cafes, and restaurants. Within minutes to elite public and private schools, Monash freeway and all that Berwick Village has to offer. This is a rare opportunity that will be snapped up quickly so call today for more information!

For those wanting to hold on for some time before building, you can put your mind at ease as there is an existing three-bedroom, 1 bathroom family home, that is currently rented out for $2,173.00 per month and in a Periodic Lease. This home includes side access to the most amazing garage/workshop/factory which will be suitable for a home business, tradesman, active handyman, man cave or storage facility for boats, caravans, jet skis, trailers & campers.

Nearby Schools:

> Nossal High School 0.80km
> Berwick Secondary College 1.92km
> Kambrya College 2.16km
> Haileybury College 2.25km
> St Margaret School 0.67km
> St Michael's School 1.12km
> Berwick Lodge Primary School 1.32km
> Berwick Primary School 1.61km

This property is a winner in all aspects and is sure to be a cash cow for the avid developer! Call now to book an inspection and express your interest!

Call Vitaldi on 0435 212 251 now to arrange a private inspection!

Disclaimer: We have in preparing this document used our best endeavours to ensure that the information contained in this document is true and accurate, but accept no responsibility and disclaim all liability with respect to any errors, omissions, or inaccuracies or misstatements in this document. Prospect purchasers should make their own enquiries to verify the information contained in this document. Purchasers should make their own enquiries and refer to the due diligence checklist provided by Consumer Affairs. Click on the link for a copy of the due diligence checklist from Consumer Affairs.

http://www.consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist
